tei:p.tei:hi: Incomplete handwritten letter from Elias to Schenker, undated, likely date June/July 1932

tei:transcription.tei:p: Reise Only the last page of the letter is known to survive. S crossed out the text, and used the reverse side for some jottings (also crossed out), which the OC Finding List calls “Notes concerning 3-part song form,” and which continue on the next eight sheets, on 2-part and 3-part song form, all on the backs of letters and unidentified text. We know from other correspondence that Schenker spent the summer in Igls only in 1932; the Schenkers left for their summer vacation usually in mid-to-late June or early July. gut verbracht und wird Ihnen nun der Aufenthalt in Igls Igls: a ski resort in Austria, 6 km from Innsbruck. in jeder Weise zusagen.
Nochmals alles Schöne und herzliche Grüße Ihnen und Ihrer lieben Frau von

tei:p.tei:hi: Incomplete handwritten letter from Elias to Schenker, undated, likely date June/July, 1932

tei:translation.tei:p: [I hope that you] have had a good journey, and that your the stay in Igls will be to your liking in every way.
Once more, all the best, and cordial greetings to you and your dear wife from
